title: URGENTE! Fungos Sumindo com Bicarbonato  Aplique Agora!

tasks.task: Apply bicarbonate of soda solution to plants for pest control and fungicide.
subtasks: Prepare a solution using 1 liter of water, 1 tablespoon of bicarbonate of soda, and a small amount of neutral detergent.
Pour the prepared solution into a spray bottle or similar applicator.
Apply the solution to plants, ensuring coverage of both sides of the leaves.
Adjust application time to avoid hot afternoons, spraying best in the late afternoon when sunlight is weaker.
Monitor plants for specific pests and adjust application frequency as needed.
Store unused solution properly and reprepare daily for best results.

tasks.task: Adjust soil pH and manage pests through bicarbonate of soda application.
subtasks: Sprinkle bicarbonate of soda around plants to lower soil acidity and deter pests.
Improve compost pile odor by incorporating bicarbonate of soda.

tasks.task: Create ant repellent using bicarbonate of soda.
subtasks: Apply bicarbonate of soda around areas where ants are a problem.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Prepare and apply bicarbonate of soda solution for pest control and disease prevention in plants.
subtasks: Mix a liter of water, 1 tablespoon bicarbonate of soda, and a small amount of neutral detergent.
Spray the solution on plants, ensuring coverage of both sides of leaves. Avoid applying during strong sunlight.
Sprinkle bicarbonate of soda around plants to adjust soil pH and deter pests, including ants and aphids.
Add bicarbonate of soda to compost to eliminate bad smells.
